title: What are some other great writing challenges like NaNoWriMo? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s a Camp NanoWrimo that occurs in the off season of Nano (which takes place in November). In Camp Nano, you choose your own goal and track your progress (as opposed to the 50,000 goal for Nano in November). Camp NaNoWriMo Pinterest offers some writing challenges and inspiration. Scribendi offers a 30 day challenge (just like Nano), that is less intensive.
